name: Intergalactic Words of Power
description:
Intergalactic Words of Power is a Space Shooter

Explore the galaxy as a solo scout to identify the evil plans of alien invaders. Destroy enemies and join together words to empower yourself and to weaken you enemies.

Note: There are some audio issues with Chrome. I suggest you use Firefox.

Controls: 
Movement: WASD
Shoot: Space or Enter or Left Click or 1

Submitted for GMTK 2021
